description: The key stages of my professional and academic career.

pr-3.title: Next Js (React) Developer
pr-3.description: Development and maintenance of web applications with React and Next.js. Collaboration with product and design teams.

pr-2.title: React Native Developer (iOS, Android)
pr-2.description: Responsible for the complete development of a mobile application: design, UI/UX design, deployment on iOS and Android, and scalable maintenance of the solution.

pr-1.title: FullStack Developer Intern
pr-1.description: Responsible for complex web applications on the administrator and client side from design to implementation and deployment.
